content: skill level intermediate while i try to make my patterns easy to read there are sections that might confuse a beginner this pattern is now for free use the same rules below still apply a huge thank you to those who did purchase it it really did help me a lot i can not thank you enough items made using the pattern can be sold in your own shop as long as you are the one who makes them but credit for the design must be given to me and linked to my ravelry account mass production of the pattern and its parts to others is prohibited it is for your private use only peachy the rat © danielle bash
